app_descript:
Blood Pressure: Heart Health

Brief:

Blood Pressure: Heart Health is a state-of-the-art mobile application designed to simplify the way individuals track and analyze their cardiovascular health. It serves as a digital alternative to traditional paper records, providing users with insightful analyses of their blood pressure readings, heart rate, and respiratory rate. Alongside monitoring, the app also educates users on preventing heart-related diseases, monitors cardiovascular disease risks, and brings forth ways to enhance overall well-being.
